title: ArvaghuttArE
sahitya:
ArvaghuttArE ingE Ayiram paghai jAti mathattai


anupallavi

  Oruyarnda vAna veLiyil ulavum aNUvAm ulaga dUsiyil


caraNam    kaDavuLenru kaNDapErgaL kANikkai peruvAr
kaTapaTavena kapaTa nATakak-kathaigaL pEshuvAr maDa 
maDap-paghai matha mathap-paghai manidarukku manidarp-
paghai aghap-paghai purap-paghai arap-paghai marap-paghai
